title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir fry in sesame oil, add soy sauce, cook until tender.
image_alt: Colorful stir fry with broccoli, peppers, and carrots

title: Classic Caesar Salad
description: A fresh Caesar salad with crispy romaine lettuce and tangy dressing.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add cheese and croutons, top with anchovies if desired.
image_alt: Caesar salad with Parmesan and croutons

title: Chicken Tacos
description: Spicy grilled chicken tacos with fresh salsa and guacamole.
instructions: Season chicken, grill until cooked, assemble tacos with salsa, guacamole, and toppings.
image_alt: Three chicken tacos with salsa and guacamole

title: Blueberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes filled with fresh blueberries, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter on griddle, add blueberries, cook until golden brown.
image_alt: Stack of blueberry pancakes with syrup
